response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic needs. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 11000}
